headline: Is Now the Right Moment for Boeing After 41% Stock Jump and Airbus Rivalry?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Boeing stock right now? You are not alone. Plenty of investors are eyeing those price charts, wondering if now is the moment to buy, sell, or just hang tight. Boeing shares have been anything but boring lately. Over the last week, the stock has slipped by 0.1%, adding to a -4.4% dip in the past month. Yet, those numbers hardly tell the whole story. Year to date, Boeing is up 25.5%, and over the past 12 months, it has soared 40.7%. Step back even further and the...

headline: PPA: Accelerated Defense Spending Will Provide Further Momentum
summary: PPA has surged since April, supported by rising global defense spending and strong positioning of its holdings in major geopolitical projects. See why PPA ETF is a buy.
